item.title: Function waitloading : Boolean;
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I’m pretty sure this is already in SRL. I’m almost positive, because I ran a script not too long ago that logged in, and waited for the loading screen, then continued the script, and it wasn’t a custom feature by the author. But if I’m mistaken, then way to be observant, this will come in handy, lol :).

item.title: Function waitloading : Boolean;
item.dc:creator: @scar_ownz scar_ownz
item.description:
@scar_ownz wrote:

i didnt see this anywhere so i created this simple function

[scar]{*******************************************************************************
function waitloading: Boolean;
By: scar_ownz
Description: if runescape is loading it will wait
*******************************************************************************}

function waitloading: Boolean;
begin
while(IsLoading) do
wait(200);
Result := True;
end;[/scar]

tell me what you think btw for itb to work you need to put it in loading.scar in the misc folder

Read full topic
